# suitableForBookmarkFile

**Type Property**

Specifies that the bookmark data include properties required to create Finder alias files.

## Declaration

```swift
static var suitableForBookmarkFile: CFURLBookmarkCreationOptions { get }
```

## Constants

- **preferFileIDResolutionMask**: Specifies that an alias created with the bookmark data prefers resolving with its embedded file ID.
- **minimalBookmarkMask**: Specifies that an alias created with the bookmark data be created with minimal information, which may make it smaller but still able to resolve in certain ways.
- **withSecurityScope**: Specifies that you want to create a security-scoped bookmark that, when resolved, provides a security-scoped URL allowing read/write access to a file-system resource; for use in an app that adopts App Sandbox.
- **securityScopeAllowOnlyReadAccess**: When combined with the [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFURLBookmarkCreationOptions/withSecurityScope] option, specifies that you want to create a security-scoped bookmark that, when resolved, provides a security-scoped URL allowing read-only access to a file-system resource; for use in an app that adopts App Sandbox.
